  LayoutView at (0,0) size 800x600
layer at (0,0) size 800x600

    LayoutBlockFlow {BODY} at (8,8) size 784x584

        LayoutText {#text} at (0,0) size 458x19
          text run at (0,0) width 458: "This tests for a bug where the color of indented text couldn't be changed."
      LayoutBlockFlow {DIV} at (0,36) size 784x20
        LayoutBlockFlow {BLOCKQUOTE} at (40,0) size 744x20
          LayoutInline {FONT} at (0,0) size 155x19 [color=#0000FF]
            LayoutText {#text} at (0,0) size 155x19
              text run at (0,0) width 155: "This text should be blue."
